price: 23. Nabii Huud iyyeh cagalah digaala edde tamaate waktih (uddurih) ixxiga yallih garil taniih anu edde rubsumem sin gudduysa.takkay immay anu yaagime marah sin able.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-uballighukum mā ur'sil'tu bihi walākinnī arākum qawman tajhalūna
